slide1.title: Since 1920 ‚Äî Quality You Can Trust
slide1.description: At Nour El-Deen, we offer the finest fresh and imported food products for over 100 years.

slide2.title: Our Branches in the Heart of Tanta
slide2.description: Find us at two main branches: El Bahr Street and El Estad Street ‚Äî with exceptional customer service 24/7.

slide3.title: Everything You Need from Food Products in One Place
slide3.description: We provide all types of food products ‚Äî dairy, meat, legumes, and spices ‚Äî with the highest quality and best prices.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Since 1920
story.description: Our commercial establishment started in the heart of Tanta over a century ago, placing quality and honesty at the forefront of its priorities. Generations continued to develop and expand our business to meet the needs of our valued customers in the field of food products of all kinds.
story.quote: The name was chosen to signify the antiquity and heritage of the commercial establishment, so we found nothing better than the face of Nour El-Deen (the great grandfather) to be our identity for the high quality we provide that does not change over time.

products.title: Our Categories
products.subtitle: We offer you the finest food products carefully selected by Nour El-Deen since 1920.

category1.name: Mafaza
category1.description: Al-Sabeel‚Äôs premium products, known for their high quality and authentic taste that reflect our heritage in choosing the best.

category2.name: Spices
category2.description: A curated selection of natural spices that bring rich and authentic flavor to your dishes.

category3.name: Nuts
category3.description: A variety of the finest fresh nuts, roasted daily to ensure exceptional taste and quality.

category4.name: Tea
category4.description: A curated selection of natural tea products that bring rich and authentic flavor to your dishes.

category5.name: Meat
category5.description: Fresh, carefully selected meat to guarantee top quality and delicious flavor in every meal.

category6.name: Vegetables
category6.description: Natural, fresh vegetables picked daily to reach you at their best quality.

category7.name: Fruits
category7.description: Seasonal fruits carefully selected for their freshness, flavor, and nutritional value.

category8.name: Canned Goods
category8.description: A range of high-quality canned foods, carefully preserved to retain their fresh taste and nutritional value.

category9.name: Beverages
category9.description: A variety of hot and cold drinks for every occasion, combining refreshing taste and rich flavor.

category10.name: Frozen Foods
category10.description: A selection of frozen products preserved with care to maintain freshness and quality.

category11.name: Dairy
category11.description: Natural dairy products with rich flavor and premium quality from trusted sources.

category12.name: Pasta
category12.description: High-quality pasta made from the finest wheat for a perfect texture and taste.

category13.name: Halva
category13.description: A selection of premium halva varieties with rich flavors and high quality.

category14.name: Cheese
category14.description: Premium cheeses with diverse flavors and a perfect texture for true cheese lovers.

category15.name: Oils
category15.description: 100% pure natural oils, carefully extracted to add rich flavor and guaranteed quality to your dishes.

footer.description: Since 1920, specialized in selling the finest food products with expertise spanning generations.
footer.name: Nour El-Deen Food Products

about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: Since 1920 ‚Äî Quality Passed Through Generations
about.description1: Nour El-Deen's journey started from the heart of Tanta city, as a small passion to provide authentic food products with an unforgettable taste. Over more than a hundred years, we have become a trusted brand for every Egyptian household, with products that combine authenticity and quality.
about.description2: Today, through our multiple branches, we work to provide the best fresh and imported food products, with full commitment to serving our customers and meeting their needs with the highest quality standards.
about.quote: Since 1920.. we maintain the taste of authenticity in every product we offer.
about.quote2: The name was chosen to signify the antiquity and heritage of the commercial establishment, so we found nothing better than the face of Nour El-Deen (the great grandfather) to be our identity for the high quality we provide that does not change over time.
about.imageAlt: Illustrative image about Nour El-Deen company

contact.subtitle: Contact Us
contact.title: We Always Love to Hear From You
contact.description: At Nour El-Deen, we care about your opinions and inquiries. You can contact us at any time and we will respond as soon as possible.
contact.address: Tanta - First El Bahr Street with El Galaa
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully! Thank you for contacting us

services.subtitle: What We Offer
services.title: Our Services at Nour Eldeen Food Supplies
services.description: We strive to meet the needs of the local market with the highest quality food products and safety standards.

service1.title: Easy and Fast Communication
service1.description: We ensure our customers can place their orders quickly and easily through efficient communication channels and friendly support at any time.

service2.title: Wholesale and Retail Distribution
service2.description: We provide reliable and fast distribution services for stores and restaurants across the country.

service3.title: Imported and Local Products
service3.description: We offer a wide variety of top-quality local and imported products from the most trusted brands.

service4.title: Trust Built Over the Years
service4.description: We believe our success is built on the trust our customers have placed in our products and services since 1920.

careers.subtitle: Careers
careers.title: Join Nour El-Deen Team
careers.description: We are looking for passionate and dedicated employees to join our team. If you are looking for a job opportunity in a dynamic and stimulating environment, we want to hear from you.
careers.infoDescription: We provide a stimulating work environment and opportunities for professional growth. We believe in developing our employees and helping them achieve their career goals.
careers.requirement2: Ability to work in a team
